description:
Quickly find files across your Windows PC and NAS using a full-text search engine.

With the growth of files and data in homes and workplaces, you need a modern solution to find files no matter where theyâ€™re stored. Qsirch PC Edition allows you to quickly find files across your Windows PC and NAS using a full-text search engine with keywords, tags and various filters.
[Enhancement]
- Renewed the app ID and the secret key of Qsirch. (The original app ID is only valid until September 30, 2023.)
[Fixed Issues]
- You can now successfully connect to a NAS via myQNAPcloud if IPv6 is enabled.
- Qsirch can now successfully display thumbnails in image search results when you switch to the timeline view.
- Fixed some minor issues.
